short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you be able to see what your GPA may be in a class if you were to get a certain score on an item.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension let's you test what you're GPA/overall grade may be if you were to get a certain grade on an assignment.*
*Note: Only works for schools in the Miami-Dade County Schools school district
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:
1. open your gradebook and select a class
2. click on the extension
3. scroll down to the bottom of page and click add new grade
